articles.description: CSK have hit a major bump as their star player, Devon Conway, will miss the initial part of the IPL 2024. Conway needs surgery on his left thumb, which means he won't be playing for at least eight weeks.
articles.content:
Conway's thumb surgery sidelines him for 8 weeks [x.com]
The Chennai Super Kings (CSK) have hit a major bump as their star player, Devon Conway will miss the initial part of the IPL 2024. Conway nee… [+2381 chars]
